body: I believe this is Hahri Lumpy’s alternative where they got a star (instead of some stupid fog) that makes several people had to have sex. Maybe they’re still creating good plot for the second season of board house. We’ll see.
From what I've been hearing, this is more a side story as opposed to season 2. It's alright...
what the hell, I thought it should be season 2 of lumpy boardhouse, why a new story?  I like the last one, such a shame. Thanks for the translation though
